WRITING.TEXT: I'm bad for the two of them. She brought warmth into my life, but my emotional baggage is a cruel thing to put onto such a wonderful person. All I want is peace. I want this rushing and buzzing to stop. I want to be able to sit down and think about my life instead of some fantasy that is blurring into the physical world. Maybe I want to be able to feel another person without getting sick to my stomach. Everything is fading. My family relationships are pretty much no more -- why do I hate them? You shouldn't hate your family. I'm such a bad person for falling in love with my friend. I should not be feeling these urges and desires for her. She is dating another dear friend. I'm sick! This all just needs to stop.

There is nothing cringe about taking a selfie in sad/awkward times. We share so much now, and who the hell are we to question how someone deals with pain? Selfies are not all about vanity -- they can be about sharing for some people. This is how she is reaching out.
I know the feel. I'm too much of a coward to do it, and I know it's what I'm supposed to do.
Paul, Paul, round as a ball.

I just feel guilty for it -- many reasons. It does just seem disloyal to my friendship, but I shouldn't have this feeling. This warm feeling. I don't deserve to love anyone, and I don't want love to be wasted on me when someone else could be taking this emotion that I'm wasting. But I don't know how to put it onto someone else. I can only absorb everyone and how they feel. I want to get up. I want to take care, but I lay in bed so much that I'm sore when I do walk around. And if I go eat or anything, all of these people will be all over me and trying to get something out of me that I don't have. I don't know what everyone wants, but they are loud about it! More and more they are nearly pressing down on me. I can't get any peace. I can't get any quite with all of these people.

Or maybe you're a loser. I am too, but I'm not moaning in denial. I think what he said is off putting, but chill. Working yourself up isn't going to get you laid. Give up. Be alone. It's not that bad, man.
It makes me not care about the sadness and pain so much. Doesn't take it away at all, but I just don't care as much about it all. Makes suicide seem not worth the bother. Sadly.

I really wish assisted suicide was for people going through this intense pain. Being able to go out peacefully sounds so nice. It seems cruel to me that society will not give us a way out. This depression -- if I could fall asleep and never wake up again -- maybe with one good friend by my side. Perfect. I don't think we are asking for a lot her. Just a little compassion.
I'd prefer it to give me the brass to do what needs to be done. But I do like it, I guess.

My dearest friend was the first person I had ever hear bring this up as something society should do. So, if we ever allow it, at least I have someone who will understand and likely agree to be by my side. I doubt I'll last that long. This Summer will be my true test. I'll be around guns all the time. Ah -- it looks so quick in videos. I just don't want to be found all bloody.

No, this obsession with truth, especially online, is annoying. Everything gets picked apart and made boring because people are screaming and moaning about absolutely everything. Who cares if the story in the post isn't true? Why does that matter? The emotion that we are sharing is real, and if someone needs to validate themselves by being Reddit Police, then, fuck, what a confused little person.

Well you're an idiot. Not a good comeback -- but it's true. Do you stand up in movie theaters after feeling your little heart tug? Do you yell out that the story is fake? Your emotions are fake if the story isn't true! Durr. You fucking people make me sick.
Please an hero. People like you take so much joy from the world. I hate stains that do this.
I'm overreacting. Salty I guess.

I just know I'll eventually do it. It's like a matter of time. I'm so afraid. All I can do is scream and stomp. Overdosing scares me the most. I'm not on medication anymore, but I was on lithium when I stopped going to a psychiatrist, and I know the death on that is a new kind of Hell.

I'm sorry that you are in such pain -- and I know that sorry means nothing, but I feel you. I have a therapy appointment tomorrow. I don't know what to say. I don't want to be put in a hospital again.

Not necessarily True. I supported Trump and was never over the top about it, especially to family and close friends, and I lost quite a fee people. I got yelled at and belittled for months every time I talked to them, and they really lost it on me when he won. Some people are just not accepting of beliefs other than their own. I'm sure it happened for the reverse as well. But it is not hard to be like that a well worded and calm young Trump supporter could lose a lot solely for support.
Seeing legitimate human connection makes them feel bad about themselves. Idk. Probably that.

I think it's sweet. And he was self aware with how it may look, but he needed to express himself and his love. If this was to some girl that he was trying to get with, I'd cringe hard, but this just seems like a nice gesture from am awkward and kind of sad guy.
I've heard people do it, and it comes across as them trying to prove a point. Probably a bad idea for them.
Things are just hot right now. I'm sure it'll all calm down soon.

It's hard. People are always willing to talk to you, if your lucky, and if not you can call a hotline. But really seeking help can hurt so much more. Our hospital system for mental health is not checked in on the same way any other facility would be. You can get treated so poorly in them. That is where I faced the worst verbal abuse of my life. Tough love maybe? The stigma is too strong. I don't know what more we can do besides give people a bit of mercy.
Sad. That had to drop hearts when people checked their phones.
I guess.
Eh, all of em are shit heads really. No need to be all weird and pissy. And if you think disowning and excommunication is the way to go because someone supported a shit head, then sad sad life, man.

Hey, I know the feel. Literally nothing works. Hours upon hours of therapy just lead me to the same breaking points time and time again. My friends care, and I'm sorry that yours seem to not, but my issues are a lot of baggage to throw at someone. I can tell they are all frustrated at this point. Meds -- whatever, they did nothing for me, but I hear success stories. Being at what seems like the end is tough. The best I can do is try and laugh at the absurdity of it all. I sort of own it when I do that. Take care. I do hope you get some calm and ease.
Howdy.
